author: alexdma
msg: * MessageBodyWriter for OWLOntology now supports n3, nt and text/plain (as n3). Code is also much slimmer. This resolves STANBOL-382
* Fixed KRType for the turtle format (text/turtle as well as application/x-turtle for pre-registration)

* Every OntoNet ontology collector resource, and ontologies therein, now respond to requests that accept RDF/XML, RDF/JSON, JSON-LD, OWL/XML, Manchester OWL, OWL Functional Syntax, Turtle, N-Triple, N3 and plain text (as N3)
* Fixed some cases where OntoNet was returning an HTTP response before it could set CORS origin (STANBOL-105)
* OntoNet root resource can now store ontologies as POST payload (first essential step of STANBOL-534)

author: robweir
msg: Added link to clone of legacy Hg respository

author: lu4242
msg: MYFACES-3487 [perf] cache unique ids generated by facelets (do not cache when isBuildingViewMetadata is set to true)

author: tucu
msg: OOZIE-761 Fixes in CoordELFunctions and testcases for Hadoop 0.23 (tucu)

author: dkulp
msg: Back out a version of the jaxb bundle due to a bug that affects Camel
